I haven't changed anything. But hotrod‘s web-ui access is very slow, this is a local env. Addr is http://127.0.0.1:8080.
And the four button have no any reaction after click, I didn't see any requests from the browser network By F12.
I have tried running hotrod with docker image, same all.
So, where is the problem?
title: example [hotrod] can't work properly on my centos
